name: tweeter
description: A twitter clone by Lighthouse Labs for web bootcamp students to learn front-end dev skillz

scripts.start: node node_modules/sass/sass.js sass-styles/style.scss public/styles/style.css && node server/index.js
scripts.local: node node_modules/sass/sass.js sass-styles/style.scss public/styles/style.css && ./node_modules/.bin/nodemon --watch server -e js server/index.js

author: Lighthouse Labs
